tos.message.reason.too_many_redirects: Causes the bot to redirect the page too many times.
tos.message.reason.wiki_abuse: Queried more than 15 pages at one time.
wiki.help.ab: Get recent abuse logs for the default wiki.
wiki.help.fandom: Toggles whether to use Fandom global Interwiki queries.
wiki.help.headers.show: Lists the currently set request headers.
wiki.help.id: Query a Wiki page based on page ID.
wiki.help.iw.get: Get the API address corresponding to the set Interwiki.
wiki.help.newbie: Get recent newbie logs for the default wiki.
wiki.help.option.l: Find the corresponding language version of this page, and return the current language if no result.
wiki.help.rc: Get recent changes for the default wiki.
wiki.help.redlink: Toggle whether to return the edit link when the page does not exist.
wiki.help.wiki_inline.desc: When enabled, containing [[ ]] or {{ }} in the message will be automatically parsed, and the wiki will be automatically queried. (e.g., [[Creeper]])
wiki.help.wiki_inline.mediawiki: Enter a title within ≺ ≻ or ⧼ ⧽ to automatically query the MediaWiki namespace for pages.
wiki.help.wiki_inline.page: Enter a title within [[ ]] to automatically query the page.
wiki.help.wiki_inline.template: Enter a title within {{ }} to automatically query the template.
wiki.help.wiki_inline.url: Send the URL of the wiki page to generate the Infobox image.
wiki.message.error.add: An error occurred: This wiki cannot be added.
wiki.message.error.fetch_log: An error occurred: Unable to fetch the log. It may be that this wiki has set the permission to view logs.
wiki.message.error.query: An error occurred: Unable to query this wiki.
wiki.message.error.render_section: An error occurred: Failed to render section. Please contact the developer for reasons.
wiki.message.error.set: An error occurred: Unable to set up this wiki.
wiki.message.fandom.disable: Disabled to use Fandom global Interwiki queries.
wiki.message.fandom.enable: Enabled to use Fandom global Interwiki queries.
wiki.message.flies: This page includes the following files:
wiki.message.headers.add.failed: Fail to update the request headers. Please check your input.
wiki.message.headers.add.success: The request headers have been updated: ${headers}
wiki.message.headers.reset.success: The request headers have been reset.
wiki.message.id.invalid: Page ID must be a number.
wiki.message.id.not_found: Page with page ID ${id} not found.
wiki.message.invalid_namespace: There is no namespace named ${namespace} on this wiki. Please check your input.
wiki.message.invalid_section.prompt: This section does not exist. The following is the possible section you want:
wiki.message.invalid_section.select: Reply with the number to select the corresponding section.
wiki.message.iw.list: Use "${prefix}wiki iw get <Interwiki>" to get the corresponding link to Interwiki.
wiki.message.iw.list.legacy: The following Interwiki(s) are currently set up:
wiki.message.iw.list.none: There is currently no Interwiki. Can be added using "${prefix}wiki iw add".
wiki.message.iw.list.prompt: Here are the custom Interwiki(s) set up for bot. To view the Interwiki for the start wiki, see: ${url}
wiki.message.magic_word: Note: The bot does not currently support magic words.
wiki.message.not_found.autofix: Note: [${title}] does not exist. Did you mean: [${redirected_title}]?
wiki.message.not_found.autofix.choice: Note: [${title}] does not exist. Did you mean:
wiki.message.not_found.autofix.choice.pr: Please directly send the specified number to obtain the corresponding content. If you reply "Yes", the content of ${number} will be selected by default. Sending other content means canceling the operation.
wiki.message.not_found.autofix.confirm: Note: [${title}] does not exist. Did you mean [${redirected_title}]?
wiki.message.redirect.template_to_page: ([${title}] does not exist and automatically redirected to [${redirected_title}])
wiki.message.redlink.disable: Disabled to return the edit link if the page does not exist.
wiki.message.redlink.enable: Enabled to return the edit link if the page does not exist.
wiki.message.rollback: Unable to send forward message. Automatically revert to traditional style.
wiki.message.search.prompt: Reply with the number to query the corresponding page.
wiki.message.set.default:
There is no start wiki set. Defaulted to the Chinese Minecraft Wiki. Use "${prefix}wiki set" to set a custom start wiki.
Example: ${prefix}wiki set https://zh.minecraft.wiki/
wiki.message.utils.redacted: External information intervention detected. Please go to the abuse log to view all messages.
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.error.empty: An error occurred: API returned no contents. Please contact the site administrator for reasons.
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.error.empty_t: An error occurred: The requested page title is empty or contains only the name of a namespace.
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.error.invalid: An error occurred: The requested page title contains unsupported characters: "${char}".
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.get_failed.ap: An error occurred while getting information from API:
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.get_failed.cl: CloudFlare blocked the request from bot. Please contact site administrator to resolve this issue.
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.get_failed.fo: The server rejected the request from bot.
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.get_failed.mo: The API interface of Moegirlpedia is unstable. Please try again later or visit the site directly.
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.get_failed.no: The link given does not specify protocol headers (The link should start with "http://" or "https://").
This site may not be a valid Mediawiki:
wiki.message.utils.wikilib.no_textextrac: Warning: This wiki not enabled TextExtracts, and the page preview content returned will be the unprocessed raw Wikitext text.
wiki.message.wiki_audit.remove.failed.ot: Failed. ${api} does not exist in Whitelist, the Whitelist of this wiki may come from other wikis of the same domain.
wiki.message.wiki_audit.untrust: Note: This wiki is not currently in the Whitelist, and the returned content will be restricted when querying this wiki.
wiki.message.wiki_audit.untrust.address:
If you need to remove restrictions, please apply for Whitelist here: 
${url}
wiki.message.wiki_bot.toggle.disable: Disabled to use wiki bot account.
wiki.message.wiki_bot.toggle.enable: Enabled to use wiki bot account.
wiki.message.wiki_inline.flies: This page includes the following files: ${file}
